meanings.definition: Performing acts of kindness or charity
meanings.sent1: The beneficently lady always helped those in need.
meanings.sent2: She smiled beneficently as she handed out food to the homeless.
meanings.sent3: The beneficently clown made everyone laugh with his silly tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her heart shone beneficently, spreading warmth wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The beneficently teacher patiently guided her students through their lessons.

meanings.definition: In a way that shows kindness or generosity
meanings.sent1: He spoke beneficently to the children, encouraging them to do their best.
meanings.sent2: The old man nodded beneficently at the young couple in approval.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred beneficently as it curled up in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone beneficently on the fields, bringing life to the crops.
meanings.sent5: The mayor waved beneficently to the crowd gathered for the parade.

meanings.definition: Showing goodwill or doing good deeds
meanings.sent1: The beneficently group organized a charity event for the community.
meanings.sent2: The king ruled his kingdom beneficently, always putting his people first.
meanings.sent3: The dog wagged its tail beneficently as it greeted its owner.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled beneficently in the night sky, guiding travelers.
meanings.sent5: The beneficently act of planting trees helped the environment flourish.
